alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued June 18 at 6:19AM EDT until June 18 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility 1/4 to 1 mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Columbus and Inland Brunswick Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Smoke from the wildfire in Green Swamp has resulted in a localized area of dense fog, particularly along Highway 211 between Supply and Bolton. Dense fog is also possible along Highway 17 between Shallotte and Bolivia, and Highway 74 between Delco and Lake Waccamaw.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
